text: The bed linen and sheet has a silky soft, cooling sheets that will immerse your body into a peaceful night relaxation. What I love about the mattress is that it can be easily configure to your comfort zones in a multiple ways at any time. While I was lying on the mattress itself, I felt that cushy comfort feel. When we first entered the store, the staff (Sin Yee and Ivy) made us feel very welcomed. They were very patient in introducing the different types of bed, pillows etc with us. Most importantly their products were super comfy and value for money ğŸ‘ğŸ½ğŸ‘ğŸ½

Great customer service there, managed to speak to the boss there and he's a stand up guy. The have a great variety of products as well, especially impressed with their customizable mattresses. Highly recommended!

I bought my tencel queen fitted sheet set from them for about $98 during their EOY sale, so worth it for a queen size! it is also the best tencel set I have compared to another brand! This sheet does not make my hair fall as much as the others, 3 days worth of hair on this sheet is equal to 1 day worth of hair compared to my other tencel and bamboo sheets! It is also more durable than my other sheets, almost as durable as cotton which means it dry faster and can withstand machine washes better! my other sheets already have lint pile up and tiny threads coming out and they dry sooo slowly! i will definitely buy from them again if I were to ever need a house warming gift, one of the best bed sheets Iâ€™ve ever had!

Overall very clean showroom,really love the mattresses. Mattresses are all super comfy. Suffered from a back injury but when I tested the mattresses,my back was not affected. Would definitely recommend:)
